lead_paragraph: The Iranian asylum seeker set himself on fire during a visit by United Nations officials to the detention center on the Pacific island nation of Nauru.

headline.print_headline: Kept From Australia, Refugee Sets Himself on Fire
headline.main: Kept From Australia, Refugee at Nauru Center Sets Himself on Fire

snippet: The Iranian asylum seeker set himself on fire during a visit by United Nations officials to the detention center on the Pacific island nation of Nauru.
abstract: Iranian refugee immolates himself at offshore detention center on island nation of Nauru, where Australia sends unauthorized migrants; act is apparently protest of conditions on island and country's detention policies.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
